name: vasudha
description: Digital Farm Management Portal for MRL & AMU Monitoring

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend && pip install -r ml-model/requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ml" "npm run dev:iot"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:ml
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend

author: VASUDHA Development Team
